channel.title: used on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in used on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-02-17
item.description: Disney is developing planned communities for fans who never want to leave its clutches (3 minute read) Storyliving by Disney is a new part of the company’s theme park division that plans to develop a series of communities for residential living.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-02-14
item.description: Coinbase’s bouncing QR code Super Bowl ad was so popular it crashed the app (2 minute read) Coinbase’s Super Bowl ad was so popular its app temporarily crashed.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-02-09
item.description: Apple announces a way to buy stuff by tapping iPhones together (2 minute read) Apple is releasing a new Tap to Pay feature for the iPhone that allows people to receive payments.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-02-07
item.description: Google Stream is what Stadia should have been from the start (3 minute read) Google Stream is a backend cloud gaming technology that Google is pitching to businesses.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-01-27
item.description: iPhone took top slot in China in holiday quarter, with highest ever market share (2 minute read) Apple hit a 23% market share in China in Q4, 2021, thanks to the success of the iPhone 13.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-11-23
item.description: Android Messages update handles Apple iMessage reactions properly (2 minute read) Google Messages on Android can now properly display emoji reactions sent from the iPhone’s Messages app.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-11-18
item.description: Amazon to ban Visa credit cards in the UK in battle over payment fees (3 minute read) Amazon will stop accepting payments from Visa credit cards issued in the UK from January 19.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-11-08
item.description: Cruise lays out its plan for ‘how’ it will make robotaxis a reality (7 minute read) GM’s self-driving subsidiary Cruise recently presented a roadmap for how the company will build autonomous vehicles that will be safer and more scalable than any human-driven vehicle.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-10-22
item.description: Amazon rolls out in-store pickup for products ordered from local retailers (3 minute read) Local Selling is a new set of services from Amazon that allows local and regional retailers to offer both in-store pickup and fast delivery to nearby customers.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-09-13
item.description: Jim Lanzone breaks up with Tinder, swipes right to take the CEO job at Yahoo, Renate Nyborg takes Tinder CEO role (3 minute read) Jim Lanzone, the current CEO of Tinder, has been appointed the new CEO for Yahoo under Apollo Global.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-08-10
item.description: Netflix is working on a bunch of new reality shows, and you’re invited (2 minute read) Netflix has opened up casting for future programming to anyone over the age of 18 in the US, Canada, United Kingdom, and Ireland.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-06-21
item.description: Google working on ‘Spot’ app and ‘Find My Device network’ (3 minute read) Google is working on a new capability for its Find My Device network called Spot.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-06-17
item.description: Apple has reportedly considered launching its own primary healthcare service (2 minute read) Apple has plans to launch a subscription-based healthcare service.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-06-08
item.description: Here’s everything Apple announced at the WWDC 2021 keynote (6 minute read) Apple’s Worldwide Developer Conference was full of announcements with all the new things coming to its various devices.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-04-22
item.description: Samsung’s New Upcycling Program Allows You To Turn an Old Galaxy Phone Into a New IoT Device (3 minute read) Samsung is trying to help people convert old phones into new IoT devices with its new Galaxy Upcycling at Home service for users in the US, UK, and South Korea.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-02-05
item.description: Google Pixel phones will soon track heart rate using only the camera (3 minute read) Google’s latest Pixel-exclusive feature is the ability to track heart rate and respiratory rate using only the existing cameras.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-01-11
item.description: Apple, Hyundai set to agree electric car tie-up (2 minute read) Hyundai Motor and Apple Inc are planning to sign a partnership deal on autonomous electric cars by March.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-01-07
item.description: Microsoft Could Bring You Back From The Dead… As A Chat Bot (1 minute read) Microsoft has filed a patent for a method that would use social data such as images, voice data, social media posts, and other written media to build a profile of a person and create a chatbot with the personality of that person.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-11-25
item.description: SpaceX Starlink engineers take questions in Reddit AMA—here are highlights (5 minute read) SpaceX Starlink engineers took part in a Reddit AMA on Saturday.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-11-20
item.description: Amazon focuses on another use for Alexa as Echo Frames smart glasses are now available (2 minute read) Amazon is moving its Echo Frames smart glasses from invite-only to general availability.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-10-27
item.description: Facebook unveils free-to-play cloud gaming service (7 minute read) Facebook Gaming has been launched in beta for a limited group of people.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-10-26
item.description: How Riot used tech from The Mandalorian to build Worlds’ astonishing mixed reality stage (4 minute read) As the pandemic goes on, events such as the annual League of Legends World Championship have to find creative ways to bring the show to the audience.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-10-01
item.description: Google announces the Pixel 5 for $699 (3 minute read) The Google Pixel 5 will be available in eight countries on October 15th, then in the US on October 29th for $699.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-09-23
item.description: Here are Tesla’s biggest announcements from Battery Day (3 minute read) Elon Musk made some big announcements at Tesla’s Battery Day event.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-09-03
item.description: Google proposes new campus billed as a ’neighborhood’ with homes and shops (1 minute read) Google has unveiled plans to build a new corporate campus in Mountain View, California.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-08-19
item.description: Google Maps is getting a lot more detail (2 minute read) Google has applied a new color-mapping algorithmic technique to its satellite imagery to redesign the maps used in Google Maps.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-08-17
item.description: AMC movie theaters will reopen on Aug. 20 with 15-cent tickets (2 minute read) More than 100 AMC cinemas across the US will open on August 20.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-08-11
item.description: SpaceX reveals plans for a Texas spaceport resort in new job ad (2 minute read) SpaceX has posted a job for a ‘Resort Development Manager’ to be based out of Brownsville, a town near its Boca Chica test and development site.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-07-24
item.description: Elon Musk reveals Boring tunnels as he aims to eliminate city traffic (3 minute read) Elon Musk has revealed renders of the first commercial station being built by his tunnel-digging company.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-07-23
item.description: Tesla’s next Gigafactory is being built in Austin, Texas (2 minute read) Tesla reported its fourth straight profitable quarter in a row with a GAAP net income of $104 million, qualifying it to be listed on the S&P 500 market index.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-07-21
item.description: The easiest way to start meditating is now in… Snapchat? (4 minute read) Snap Minis are small apps that are designed to be used through Snapchat’s chat function.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-07-14
item.description: Google just put a photo of the Pixel 4A on its store (1 minute read) An image of Google’s Pixel 4A was mistakenly published on its Canadian store.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-07-01
item.description: Nearby Sharing — Android’s AirDrop competitor — is rolling out now in beta (5 minute read) A beta test for Android’s Nearby Sharing feature is rolling out via the Play Services beta.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-06-30
item.description: Uber reportedly looking to buy Postmates delivery service (1 minute read) Uber has made an offer to purchase Postmates.
